title: An awk style json processor less than 100 lines
author: winok8
content: readme.md jsonawkawk style json line processor( js code)support awk style: $ begin endsupport loadash: _installationnpm install -g jsonawkusagefile.json{"userid":"001","name":"torvalds"}{"userid":"002","name":"tj"}cat file.json | jsonawk 'console.log($.name)'torvaldstj lodashcat file.json | jsonawk 'console.log(_.join([$.name, "making world better"], " "))'torvalds making world bettertj making world better begin,endcat file.json | jsonawk 'begin{var n=0;}{n++;console.log(_.join([$.name, "making world better"], " ")) }end{console.log(n)}' torvalds making world bettertj making world better2todocontact al@xfruit.cn
